entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:11 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -31.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 8:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -31.7°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -35.6°C
Wind: SW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
